thread.title: Good location would stay again
thread.title_full: Good location would stay again - Review of The Hotel 91, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lucyduck13
title: Good location would stay again
text: Good location if you want to be in the heart of chinatown. No frills but clean warm and comfortable. You can hear the subway but it didnt bother us at all. The free coffee is a nice touch, and made sure you started the day well. The staff were friendly and helpful, until the last day. My son dropped his baseball cap as we were leaving, and I emailed to ask if they could post it to us, no one even bothered to reply.
